five_star_reviews.text: Brad did an awesome job installing our sink and dish washer.  He was professional and very helpful. Definitely recommend him and will use him in the future!

We had a major water leak that flooded our yard late one night so we called a 24 hour number for a competitor and received no call back.  I got a recommendation to call Brad the next morning and he was there in 2 hours and got it fixed.  So fast and reasonable!  He will be our plumber from now on.

BATJAC replaced our residential water heater with a tankless heater last week. Brad was quick to respond when I called to request a quote, listened to my actual needs, and made useful recommendations. His installation work was excellent, his pricing was fair, and he left the site clean when he was finished. BATJAC is at the top of my list for the next time I need a plumber.

Very happy with BATJAC. We had been trying to get our shower fixed for almost two months and just kept getting the run around from other plumbers. Stumbled on BATJAC and about an hour after I called him he was at our house looking at our shower. He was super honest, straight forward, did exactly what he said he would do and what we wanted. Very very reasonably priced as well. The only plumber we’ll call now. Thanks again!

Brad did an excellent job installing a new fireplace insert for us. He is smart and efficient.
We will definitely call on him again for any plumbing issues we have.
I didn’t feel dumb asking a lot of questions and he was so helpful!
Brad and his crew do an amazing job. Support this veteran owned and operated company!!!

He was out within a couple hours to replace a hot water heater.  Extremely knowledgeable and professional, friendly and personable.  I will definitely be calling again with any future plumbing projects.  Thank you for making things feel so easy and affordable.  You are appreciated.
Excellent service and super friendly.
Went the extra mile. Best plumber in the river valley.

Exceptional service from an honest and dependable professional. We called Brad to replace a water heater for my parents.  He was at our home in less than an hour and replaced the unit same day.  Highly recommend Brad. Thankful and grateful customer.
Brad at BATJAC is friendly, prompt and professional.  I have used him 3 times and each time he did a great job.  He was there when he scheduled me and did what he said.  Very dependable company.

Honest, dependable, and will definitely use again.  Had what looked to be a simple repair when shower would not turn off.  Another company came out & said couldn't be done & whole now shower fixture needed to be replaced.  Called Brad & he spoke confidently that he could fix the seat the other guy said he could not.  Other guy quoted $1700 for new shower assembly.  Brad did it for $175.  Thanks for quick & honest work.

We have been friends since we were kids. He has done work at my house and my Church and many of my Customers houses (we both have our own business).  There is nobody I trust more to handle my professional plumbing work. Hard worker and skilled!

Was very quick to respond when my pipes froze. Got me going in short order and followed up to prevent future problems.
Not only that, he’s a great guy.
Very professional, quality craftsmanship, found and diagnosed the problem and made the repair in a timely manner. Highly recommended and will use again!

Brad Gwinn of BATJAC Plumbing came the very next day after I called to address my toilet issues. He explained all of the needed repairs and what the cost would be for each, so I could decide how much I wanted him to do. He is very nice, a veteran, and did a fabulous job. I will surely use him again.
Fast, friendly and honest service. BATJAC Plumbing should be your go-to for plumbing repair in the Greenwood area. Cannot recommend this Veteran owned business enough!
Needed a hot water replaced, called him and the next day he had one picked up and installed at the house. Very clean and professional work, I’ll definitely be using him next time!
I’m a contractor and BaTJAC is my plumber for commercial & residential needs. He has always met my expectations and my clients value you his work.

Brad came out and gave a good estimate, and explained what needed to be done. He was very professional and replaced our water main very quickly. I highly recommend him to anyone that has plumbing needs.
Very tentative to what I was wanting and his work spoke for itself. Professional appearance and functionality.

Texted Brad with a plumbing er. Basically pipe under sink was broke and no shut off. He responded to my text with in seconds. Went directly to my sons house got the whole thing fixed and added a shut off and had it all done in less then an hour from when we texted him. Fast friendly and knowledgeable. Highly recommended. This was our first experience with him but wont be the last
Excellent service, honest and upfront about work required and cost. No hidden cost at the end of the job and did it right the first time.
Completely rebuilt our ice damaged flooded offices. Excellent quality and workmanship, would highly recommend. Will using from now on exclusively.
